Texts.Chs: 机甲很有用，但默认机甲几乎不适合太空，且通常是垃圾货。你需要一张^orange;机械部件制造台^reset;，然后制造一双^orange;斯托克机械足^reset;来替换糟糕的出厂自带机械足。
Texts.Eng: Mechs are quite useful but their basic mechs are barely space-worthy and generally trash. You'll want to get to a ^orange;Mech Crafting Table^reset; and build some ^orange;Stock Mech Legs^reset; to replace the awful factory default model.

Texts.Chs: 你可以进一步改良这些部件，也可以一次性升级到^orange;改良机甲足^reset;。这种思路同样适用于^green;推进器^reset;。
Texts.Eng: You can further improve on those legs, too, by upgrading them once more into ^orange;Improved Mech Legs^reset;. The same applies to your ^green;Boosters^reset;.
